description.lang: The G1 Z-Wave Gateway is a Smart Home Solution on a Cube. With this gateway, you can control all Z-Wave devices in your house through your iPhone/iPad and Android mobiles/pads. Push notification on iPhone/iPad and Android for device and scene events.Plug & play by ID/password.Control up to 120 Z-Wave devices.Support Amazon Alexa and Google Home.Support IFTTT.Support Geo-Sense.Internal real time clock.Watchdog function to prevent system failure.
Z-Wave Plus Lifeline, report Device Reset Locally when reset.
